title: GS-510 Vehicular Troposcatter Communication System
explain: The GS-510 is a BLOS, small / medium capacity and point-to-multipoint (PMP) vehicular troposcatter communication system, which is used for communication between central command post and multiple remote stations or sub-command posts, such as PMP communication between missile troop brigade and battalion command posts, EW troop battalion and company command posts.
features:
Functions

  • Medium distance, medium/small capacity, BLOS and PMP communication
  • Service: voice, data, and IP data
  • Encryption
  • EOW
  • BITE
  • Network management and monitor &control

Features

  • High integration: one vehicular central station, integration of vehicle, antenna, equipment and
    power supply, can simultaneously communicate with 4 remote stations
  • Quick deploymentThe azimuth and elevation of the antenna can be automatically adjusted with
    motor-driven rotating pedestal to assist with antenna alignment, allowing for convenient set-up
    and dismantling
  • Excellent anti-fading capability Employing multiple diversity Rx technique
  • RelayBoth central station and remote station can be operated as relay station
form:
AntennaCentral station: four 1.8 m×1.3 m parabolic antennas;Remote station: two 2.4 m parabolic antennas.
Specifications
Operation frequency4,400~ 4,520 MHz4,480~ 5,000 MHz
Communication range80 km in one direction（smooth Sphere, Ns=310, 64 kbps, Pe≤1×10-6 95% reliability）
Tx power80 W (output of RF unit)
Tx rate32/64/128/256/512 kb/s
Service32 kbps: 2-ch voice + 2-ch data;Other rates: 2-ch voice + 2-ch data + 1-ch IP data
